name: DIN_LOC_ROOT_CLMFORC
description: CLM-specific directory in the data archive file for CLM type input forcing data. Must be a relative path.

name: RUN_STARTDATE
description: Run start date (yyyy-mm-dd). Only used for startup or hybrid runs.

name: STOP_OPTION
description: Sets the run length along with STOP_N and STOP_DATE

name: STOP_DATE
description: Alternative date yyyymmdd date option, sets the run length with STOP_OPTION and STOP_N negative value implies off

name: RUN_TYPE
description: Determines the model run initialization type.

name: co2_ppmv
description: CO2 concentration to use when co2_type is constant
